description:
Fun painting app, based on Unlimited Layers with Blend Modes and Masks

Any brush can be used with 3 professional-level realtime technologies of calligraphy: Line Delay, Rope Stabilization and Correction, combine it for best results. With 100% calligraphy the line will be very smooth even if you are drawing with your finger

Brushes can be Dry, Glossy and Wet. There are 3 types of Wet brushes: Without Pull, With Pull and Super-Precise. Any brush can instantly became Smudge-brush with Finger instrument. Textured brushes are also supported

If you like to draw with simple round brush, there are quick settings for Hardness, Ovality & Rotation of your brush shape. Or, if you prefer realistic brushes, large Pro-Library of shapes (>1000 textures) can be used to create new brushes of any type

Apple Pencil is fully supported, including Touch Force, Tilt, Azimuth and Predicted Points. There are settings for each Pencil ability. You also can disable finger-painting, if you never use it

Gestures: 2-fingers tap for Undo and 3-fingers tap for Redo any action

For color choosing there are 2 different Color Pickers and Palettes with Gradient Mixer. Use long-pressure gesture for quick color choosing

Time-Lapse video recording is enabled by default


FEATURES LIST:

Create Animation:
* Unlimited frames of animation
* Multiple animation layers
* Export to mp4, hevc, gif, apng

Learn How to Draw by copying Professional Art:
* Use any Painting or Sketch as a Lesson
* Tap left side of screen to switch between your painting and the lesson
* 4 lesson types: "Equal size", "First Layer", "Horizontal split", "Vertical split"

Brushes:
* Preinstalled professional brushes
* Glossy brushes
* 50+ brush settings
* Shapes library
* Calligraphy
* Apple Pencil support
* Smudge brushes with 3 different smudge technologies
* Export-import of brushes
* Dynamic shape
* Realistic brushes
* Any brush can became a smudge brush with Smudge tool

Colors:
* 2 Color Pickers
* Color mixer
* Palettes
* Import/Export of palettes

Interface:
* Right and left handed interface
* Light or dark interface
* Custom interface color

Layers:
* Unlimited layers
* Dynamic ssd/operative memory using for layers
* Masks 
* Clear / Fill / Select / Sort / Duplicate
* Blend modes
* Opacity and visibility
* Import any image as a layer
* Transform without loosing image quality

Gestures:
* 2-Fingers tap for Undo
* 3-Fingers tap for Redo
* Long pressure for quick color choosing
* Bucket Tool: Drag the Color circle onto the canvas
* Only-gestures control with Swipes

Advanced:
* Flip canvas horizontally
* Time-Lapse video recording
* Transform instrument
* Selection tool
* PNG with transparency creation

HOME PLANNER: THE ULTIMATE HOUSE DESIGN AND RENOVATION APP

Bring your dream space to life with Home Planner, the ultimate app for design and renovation enthusiasts. Featuring advanced tools like 3D modeling with home design AI, a built-in 3D scanner, and precise measure functionality, this house design app is perfect for both professionals and DIY enthusiasts. Whether you’re reimagining a single room or planning a complete overhaul, Home Planner offers everything you need to design, customize, and visualize your space effortlessly.

Transform Your Vision with Home Design AI and 3D Modeling
Craft stunning designs using Home Planner’s intuitive 3D modeling tools. Create detailed layouts in both 2D and 3D, allowing you to visualize every aspect of your project. The app’s advanced 3D modeling capabilities and top-notch home design AI enable you to experiment with different furniture arrangements and decor styles. Let your vision come to life with accuracy and ease.

Scan Your Space with the 3D Scanner
Home Planner’s built-in 3D scanner lets you capture your space in seconds. By scanning any room, you can instantly generate accurate dimensions and layouts. The 3D scanner ensures every detail of your space is accounted for, eliminating guesswork and saving you time. 

Measure with Unmatched Precision
Avoid costly design errors with Home Planner’s precise measure tools. The integrated digital tape measure captures exact dimensions of walls, furniture, and spaces, ensuring every element fits perfectly. Whether you’re measuring for a new sofa or planning a full renovation, Home Planner ensures functional and aesthetic designs.

Seamlessly Combine 3D Modeling and Scanning
Combine 3D modeling with the 3D scanner to create highly detailed and accurate designs with our home design AI. Scan your space, then use the house design app’s 3D modeling tools to explore various layouts and decor styles. Home Planner ensures your projects are as precise as they are creative.

House Design App that Customizes Every Detail of Your Space
Personalize your designs with unparalleled flexibility. Experiment with materials, colors, and finishes to craft a space that reflects your style. With 3D modeling and home design AI, you can visualize every change in real-time, while the 3D scanner and measure tools provide the accuracy of your floor plans.

Immersive Visuals with Realistic Renders
Showcase your designs with lifelike renders and detailed visualizations. Home Planner’s 3D modeling features produce stunning results, complete with realistic lighting and textures. Share your designs with clients, collaborators, or friends to get feedback and refine your concepts.

House Design App that Streamlines Your Workflow with Powerful Tools
Home Planner’s comprehensive toolset - including 3D modeling, top-notch home design AI, a 3D scanner, and precise digital measure tape - makes it easy to plan and execute projects efficiently. From scanning a room to generating layouts and creating detailed designs.

Collaborate and Share Your Designs
Share your projects with ease using Home Planner’s collaborative features. Gather feedback and refine your ideas effortlessly. With Home Planner and our home design AI, turning your vision into reality is a collaborative and enjoyable experience.

Unlock Premium Features of Advanced House Design App
Upgrade to premium and explore the full potential of Home Planner:

— Access pre-designed layouts for quick inspiration
— Create unlimited projects for large-scale designs
— Unlock an extensive catalog of decor and furniture items
— Generate high-quality renders and immersive visuals
— Utilize advanced 3D modeling AI for home design, 3D scanner, and measure tools

Home Planner combines cutting-edge technology with user-friendly design. With advanced 3D modeling AI for home design, an integrated 3D scanner, and precise digital measure tape, this house design app has everything you need to create stunning spaces.

And it's not just about the look. With Themify widgets for Lock & Home screens and StandBy, you can keep the info you need handy, turn your phone into a smart display, and even have a digital pet right on your screen!


COMPLETE MAKEOVER of your device!

Anime, Urban, Animals, Nature, Cars, just to name a few—we have still and live wallpapers for every taste and mood! With Themify, you're entirely free to choose any wallpaper that perfectly suits your vibe.

Sync Themify with the Health app and effortlessly track your daily sleep, steps, and water intake from convenient and stylish widgets. 

UNLIMITED ACCESS MEMBERSHIP SUBSCRIPTION

ibis Paint X is a popular and versatile drawing app downloaded more than 460 million times in total as a series, which provides over 47000 brushes, over 27000 materials, over 2100 fonts,84 filters, 46 screentones, 27 blending modes, recording drawing processes, stroke stabilization feature, various ruler features such as radial line rulers or symmetry rulers, clipping mask features.

*YouTube channel
Many tutorial videos on ibis Paint are uploaded to our YouTube channel.
Subscribe it!
https://youtube.com/ibisPaint

*Concept/Features
- A Highly functional and professional features surpassing that of desktop drawing apps.
- Smooth and comfortable drawing experience realized by OpenGL technology.
- Recording your drawing process as a video.
- SNS feature where you can learn drawing techniques from other users' drawing process videos.

*Feedback from users
We receive many good reputations from users.
- I could have never assumed that I can draw such a beautiful drawings on smartphones!
- Easiest to use among all drawing apps!
- I have learned how to draw digital drawings without Mac or PC!

*Features
ibis Paint has high functionality as a drawing app along with features of sharing drawing processes with other users.

[Brush Features]
- Smooth drawing at up to 120 fps.
- Over 47000 kinds of brushes including dip pens, felt tip pens, digital pens, air brushes, fan brushes, flat brushes, pencils, oil brushes, charcoal brushes, crayons and stamps.

[Layer Features]
- You can add layers as many as you need with no limit.
- Layer parameters that can be set to each layers individually such as layer opacity, alpha blending, adding, subtracting, and multiplying.
- A handy clipping feature for clipping images, etc.
- Various layer commands such as layer duplication, import from the photo library, horizontal inversion, vertical inversion, layer rotation, layer moving, and zooming in/out.
- A feature for setting layer names to distinguish different layers.

[Manga Features]
- Advanced text tool function featuring Vertical, Horizontal, Stroke, Font select, and Multiple text functions.

*About ibis Paint purchase plan
The following purchase plans are available for ibis Paint:
- ibis Paint X (free version)
- ibis Paint (paid version)
- Remove Ads Add-on
- Prime Membership (Monthly plan / Yearly plan)
There is no difference in features other than the presence or absence of advertisements for the paid version and the free version.
If you purchase the Remove Ads Add-on, the ads will not be displayed and there will be no difference from the paid version of ibis Paint.
In order to use more advanced functions, the following Prime Membership (Monthly plan / Yearly plan) contracts are required.

[Prime Membership]
A prime member can use the prime features. Only for the first time, a 7-day or 1-month free trial is available. Prime membership entitles you to the following features.
- 20GB of cloud storage capacity
- Vector tool(*1)
- Prime Materials
- Prime Canvas Papers
- Prime Fonts
- Tone Curve filter
- Gradation Map filter
- Levels Adjustment filter
- Prime Adjustment Layers
- Surrounding Fill・Surrounding Eraser
- AI Disturbance
- Artwork folder feature
- Import original brush patterns
- Remove watermark from videos
- No advertisements displayed
- Plus many other features exclusive to Prime Membership!
(*1) You can try it for free for up to 1 hour per day.
* After you become a Prime Membership with a free trial, renewal fee will be charged automatically unless you cancel your Prime Membership at least 24 hours before the end of the free trial period.
* We will add premium features in future, please look out for them.

*Questions and support
Questions and bug reports in reviews will not be responded to, so please contact ibis Paint support.
https://ssl.ibis.ne.jp/en/support/Entry?svid=25

*ibisPaint's terms of service
https://ibispaint.com/agreement.jsp

PhotoWidget is a free application – the easiest way to customize your iPhone and iPad!

PhotoWidget makes it effortless to decorate your iPhone and iPad.
Not just useful widgets — you can also change stylish app icons in one go and create stunning AI-generated DIY wallpapers.

【All-in-One Home & Lock Screen Customization】
PhotoWidget is the easiest way to personalize your iPhone and iPad.
Set wallpapers, widgets, and app icons all at once to match your favorite theme — from minimal and aesthetic to cute, trendy, or elegant.

● PhotoWidget / D-Day (Countdown) / Zodiac / Shortcut / Battery / Calendar / Clock / Memo / To-Do List / Phost (Random Postcards)

Pixnova AI is the ultimate AI-powered photo editor and video creator. With thousands of AI filters and style transformations, you can instantly transform your photos and videos—turn snapshots into anime characters, Polaroid-style effects, Disney 3D cartoon styles, game avatars, action figures, sketches, or even the latest Nano Banana trends in just seconds.

We provide top-tier old photo restoration technology that enhances details, repairs scratches, fading, and damage, improves image quality and resolution, bringing your cherished memories back to life. Whether you’re creating viral TikTok clips, personalized avatars, or treasured family moments, Pixnova AI delivers studio-quality results.

Our AI Photo feature allows you to quickly generate black-and-white portraits, professional studio headshots, LinkedIn profile photos, and more. You can also replace outfits instantly, experiencing different clothing styles from the comfort of your home. In addition, with hundreds of hairstyle options, whether you want to change your haircut or hair color, it’s all just a tap away.

Our signature Image-to-Video feature brings still photos to life, transforming them into dynamic animations and even generating the latest AI-powered hugging effects. Plus, we release new filters and templates every week to keep you ahead of the trends on TikTok, X, Instagram, Facebook, and beyond.

【Key Features:】
● Create Your AI Profile: Tailor your digital identity for personalized image generation.
● Diverse Styles & Filters: From fantasy to fashion, select from countless creative styles.
● High-Resolution Images: Save and share, professional-quality images.
● AI Twin Generator – Ever wondered what your digital twin would look like? Meet your AI alter ego in seconds.
● AI Aging Photo-Videos – Transform your look with AI Aging Photo, the baby to adult AI generator that shows realistic age progression.
● Trend Videos – Stay ahead of viral trends with AI-generated dynamic short videos ready for social media.
● AI Dress-Up: Upload a full-body photo of yourself, pair it with any clothing image you love, and watch as our cutting-edge AI instantly creates a realistic virtual try-on.
● Old Photo Restoration: Instantly repair scratches, sharpen details, and even colorize black-and-white photos.
● AI Hairstyle: Try endless looks in seconds with our AI salon. Experiment with trendy cuts, fresh colors, or classic styles—our AI hair changer instantly gives you a realistic virtual makeover. 
● AI Makeup: Discover your perfect look with AI Makeup. Apply natural, glam, or creative styles in one tap, to enhance your selfies with studio-quality results.
● AI Photo:You can generate a full set of high-quality AI portraits that look styled, polished, and studio-ready with our AI Photo Generator. From LinkedIn professional headshots, vacation outfits to streetshots.

[Pixnova AI Automatic Subscription Service Statement]

Subscription Services：
Pixnova AI Weekly Subscription
Pixnova AI Annual Subscription
Payment：
After confirming your purchase, the subscription will automatically renew, and Apple will deduct the fee from your iTunes account.

Renewal:
Your iTunes account will be charged within 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription period. Upon successful payment, the subscription will automatically be extended for another subscription period.

Cancel Renewal:
You can cancel the automatic renewal in the iTunes/Apple ID settings at least 24 hours before the current subscription period ends. If you cancel within 24 hours of the renewal, the subscription fee for the next period will still be charged, and the subscription will only be canceled after the next subscription period ends.

Collaborate on the go. View, share, and mirror designs with just a few taps. With Figma’s official mobile app, you can:

REVIEW YOUR FILES
* Access Figma, FigJam, Prototype and Slides files.
* Quickly search for files by name or browse your recently viewed files.
* Navigate between pages and flows in any file.

CREATE AND REPLY TO COMMENTS
* Add comments and mention teammates anywhere in a file.
* Get notified for new comments and replies.
* Resolve and respond to comments on the go.
* View a list of all comment threads in a file.

SHARE FILES WITH YOUR TEAM
* Invite collaborators and share links to your files.

PLAY YOUR PROTOTYPES
* Play and replay prototypes in full screen.
* Adjust prototype scaling.
* Toggle hotspot hints.

MIRROR DESIGNS IN REAL-TIME
* Sync selected frames from desktop to your mobile device.
* Watch real-time edits to your designs on your mobile device.
* Preview how assets in your design look scaled to a device screen.

EXPLORE SLIDES EFFORTLESSLY
* View and comment on decks in both landscape and portrait mode.

MANAGE PERMISSIONS ON THE FLY
* Update file permissions to control who can view or edit your work.

BROWSE AND SWITCH WORKSPACES AND ACCOUNTS
* Navigate between teams, plans, projects, and accounts.

On iPad, you can also use FigJam to:
* Sketch with the Apple Pencil to explore and iterate on ideas more fluidly.
* Share and riff on early thinking with your team.
* Annotate designs to share feedback.
* Jot down ideas whenever inspiration strikes.

developer: FITNESS TRAINING GLOBAL ONE MEMBER COMPANY LIMITED
description:
Experience the next generation of drawing with Sketchify – the ultimate tool that transforms how you sketch, trace, and create art. Powered by advanced Augmented Reality (AR) and Artificial Intelligence (AI), this app redefines what's possible in digital and real-world drawing.

Whether you're a beginner, a hobbyist, or a professional artist, Sketchify provides all the tools you need to learn, practice, and create – with unmatched precision and creative freedom.

CORE FEATURES

* AR Drawing – Project, Trace & Create:

- Use your phone or tablet camera to project any image onto real-world surfaces – paper, canvas, wall, or any workspace.
- Trace outlines directly through the screen in real time, making it perfect for learning to draw, replicating artwork, or creating complex designs.
- AR Drawing adapts to your environment and gives you the feeling of drawing with guidance – not just on screen, but in real space.

* Import Image – Draw Anything You Imagine:

- Instantly import photos, sketches, or designs from your photo library.
- Combine with AR Drawing to trace your personal references with perfect positioning.
- Adjust size, rotate, zoom, and align images with your surface for an accurate drawing experience.
- This feature empowers you to draw anything – whether it's a photo you took, a downloaded image, or your own digital creation.

* Drawing Lessons – Learn, Practice, Improve

- Step-by-step drawing guides help you move from basic shapes to advanced techniques.
- Great for beginners who want structured learning or artists looking to refine their skills.
- Lessons are fully integrated with AR drawing for a fully interactive learning experience.

* AI Drawing – Let Ideas Become Art Instantly

- Describe any concept or scene, and our built-in AI generates original artwork within seconds.
- Customize AI-generated images and use them as references for tracing or sketching.
- Ideal for overcoming creative blocks and finding inspiration on demand.

* Search Image – Unlimited Visual Inspiration

- Search directly inside the app to find high-quality image references without switching apps.
- Combine search + AR + import for the fastest and most intuitive drawing workflow possible.

* Recording – Capture Your Entire Creative Process

- Record your drawing sessions from start to finish.
- Perfect for tutorials, sharing your process on social media, or reviewing your progress.
- Export and share with a single tap.

* Coloring Tools – Bring Your Art to Life

- After tracing or sketching, enhance your artwork with easy-to-use coloring tools.
- Play with palettes, gradients, and fill options to make your drawings vibrant and personal.
- Ideal for finished pieces or creative practice sessions.

SMART FEATURES & CUSTOM SETTINGS

- Customizable projection: adjust image placement, zoom, and rotation for optimal drawing alignment.

- User-friendly interface: clean, responsive, and made for creators at any skill level.

- Works seamlessly on both iPhone and iPad.

WHY CREATORS LOVE Sketchify

- AR Drawing is the foundation – unmatched precision and freedom.

- Import anything you want to draw – your photos, AI creations, web images, and more.

- Combines drawing, tracing, coloring, AI, and learning in one powerful app.

SUBSCRIPTION PRICING & TERMS:

- Payment is charged to your iTunes account upon purchase confirmation.
- Manage subscriptions and turn off auto-renewal in Account Settings.
- Subscriptions auto-renew unless canceled 24 hours before the end of the current period, with renewal charged 24 hours prior.
- Canceled subscriptions remain active until the period ends; no refunds are issued.
- Unused portions of free trials are forfeited upon subscription purchase.

Privacy policy: https://fitnesstrainingglobal.com/privacy_policy.html

- Intuitive and easy-to-use editor

Create a flyer using the flyer maker app. 30000+ flyer templates. Quick & Easy to Use.

No flyer design skills are needed. With over 30,000 customizable flyer templates, you'll turn your ideas into creative flyer designs in minutes.

Flyer Maker & Poster Maker provides quick and easy-to-use graphic design tools. You don't need graphic design skills to make your own poster and flyer.

Advertisement Maker
Promote events, businesses, products, and more with our versatile flyer maker app. Craft compelling business flyers, real estate flyers, restaurant menus, and more.

Banner Maker
Need to make a banner for your business advertising?
Flyer Maker offers various customizable banner templates to help you create effective banner design for web pages, YouTube, Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, and other social media platforms in just a few minutes.

Announcement Maker
Flyer Maker offers a versatile array of announcement templates on editable canvas suitable for various purposes, whether it's announcing a new office location or job vacancies, sharing joyful news like births or weddings, or communicating somber messages such as the passing of a loved one.

Social Media Post Maker
Creating stunning Instagram posts is easy with Flyer Maker. Our user-friendly platform offers a wide range of customizable design templates for every occasion and style.

Birthday Flyer Maker
Honoring someone on their birthday can take many forms, and surprising them with a personalized happy birthday poster is just one delightful option. With Poster Maker, crafting a unique and customized birthday poster is a breeze.

Festival Flyer Maker
Spread the word and bring out the crowd to celebrate your festival in style. Whether it's Christmas, Thanksgiving, Diwali, or any other festive occasion, make your event unforgettable with creative promotions showcased through eye-catching, high-quality posters. With Poster Maker's customizable festival poster templates, you can ensure your celebration becomes the talk of the town, no matter the occasion.

Help us improve by rating the Flyer Maker & Poster Maker app and sharing your valuable feedback.

If you choose to subscribe to any of the “Flyer Pro” Subscriptions, the payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. any unused portion of the free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when you purchase a subscription to that publication. CamPlan provides fast and modern way to create modern 2D & 3D floor plans and interior design concepts with the interior AI designer and the LiDAR scanning features!

Floor Plan Scanner & Creator
• LiDAR-based capture: Use your iPhone or iPad to scan a room. Walls, windows, doors and measurements are detected automatically.
• 2D and 3D editing: Adjust layouts in a flat view or explore a rendered 3D model.
• AR preview: Place the virtual plan back into the real space to check scale and positioning.
• Export options: Save as images or industry-standard files (USDZ, OBJ, DXF, CAD, DAE, etc.).

• Symbols & texts: add texts, annotations, electrical symbols and more.

AI Interior Designer
• Photo-driven redesign: Snap a picture of any room and describe changes (“paint walls blue,” “add a reading nook,” “switch to Scandinavian style”).
• Style guidance: Get suggestions on colors, furniture, lighting, materials and layouts that suit your space.
• Real-time updates: See adjustments applied instantly.

Available on iOS, iPadOS, and macOS, CamPlan boasts a fully optimized interface with OS-specific gestures for a seamless user experience. Enjoy full accessibility support, including light and dark modes.

These toolsets are ideal for homeowners, real estate agents, electricians, renovators, and architects.

CamPlan Premium:
With CamPlan Premium you can create unlimited projects. In addition, you can share and collaborate with others.
CamPlan Premium is available as a monthly or yearly subscription. CamPlan will automatically charge your iTunes Account at the end of your subscription unless the auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of your current period. You can turn off auto-renew at any time and still receive full functionality until the end of your current period, but we can't refund unused portions of the subscription.
